Description.Metadata: Yesterday [sound recording] : the wonderful music of the Beatles.

Michelle -- A hard day's night -- If I fell -- All my loving -- Can't buy me love -- Eleanor Rigby -- I call your name -- Lucy in the sky with diamonds -- Yellow submarine -- Good day sunshine -- Love -- What is life? -- My sweet Lord -- Let it be -- Here, there and everywhere -- Ob la di-- ob la da -- Here comes the sun -- Mother nature's son -- Something -- You never give me your money -- Ticket to ride -- Norwegian wood -- Blackbird -- She's leaving home -- We can work it out -- This boy -- Rocky Raccoon -- Bangla Desh -- Come together -- From me to you -- Get back -- She loves you -- Strawberry fields forever -- Imagine -- You're gonna lose that girl -- When I'm 64 -- Help -- Tell me why -- A day in the life -- Lovely Linda -- The fool on the hill -- All you need is love -- Long and winding road -- Paperback writer -- Lady Madonna -- Carry that weight -- I will -- It don't come easy -- Maybe I'm amazed -- Sgt. Pepper's Lonely Heart's Club Band -- With a little help from my friends -- Hey Jude -- And I love her -- Penny Lane -- Uncle Albert -- Day tripper -- Magical mystery tour -- You've got to hide your love away -- Yesterday -- Hello, goodbye.
Performed by the Terry Baxter Orchestra and Chorus.
Terry Baxter Orchestra and Chorus. prf
